entities.name: victory song
entities.description: The victory song is a composition by Harry Potter, sung in the corridors after Voldemort's defeat.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who has defeated Voldemort and is now feeling relief and exhaustion.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is one of Harry's friends who has stuck with him for so long and deserves the truth about what happened in the forest.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is another friend of Harry's who has been with him throughout his journey and deserves to know the truth.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist who has been defeated by Harry Potter.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley was a member of Dumbledore's Army and was killed in the battle against Voldemort.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a werewolf and a member of the Order of the Phoenix who was killed in the battle against Voldemort.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a Metamorphmagus and a member of the Order of the Phoenix who was killed in the battle against Voldemort.

entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: The Pensieve is a magical device used by Harry to store his memories.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The forest is the location where Harry had an important encounter with Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry Potter composed and sang the victory song in the corridors after Voldemort's defeat.
Harry Potter owed an explanation to Ron Weasley about what happened in the forest.
Harry Potter also owed an explanation to Hermione Granger about what happened in the forest.
Ron Weasley is a friend of Harry Potter's who has stuck with him for so long.
Hermione Granger is also a friend of Harry Potter's who has been with him throughout his journey.
Voldemort was defeated by Harry Potter in the final battle.
Fred Weasley was killed by Voldemort's followers.
Lupin was also killed in the battle against Voldemort.
Tonks was another member of the Order of the Phoenix who was killed by Voldemort's followers.
Harry Potter used the Pensieve to store his memories.
Harry Potter had an important encounter with Voldemort in the forest.
